snippet.title: Tour de France 2022 | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Fight for the yellow jersey in the official game of the Tour de France 2022. Experience the new online mode with weekly challenges and leaderboards. In Solo mode, you can now deal with incidents (injuries, illnesses) during the 92 stages available.
#TourdeFrance2022 will be available PC, PlayStation & Xbox consoles on June 9, 2022.

Recruiting, budgeting, strategy - all decisions are made by you. In Pro Cycling Manager 2022, discover the new youth tracking system, new options to customize your experience, a more offensive squad, and much more.        
#ProCyclingManager2022 will be available only on PC on June 9, 2022.
-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGaming 
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/NaconGaming 
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/Nacon
